component.name: Toledo1
component.summary: Achieve search sovereignty with Toledo1, a compound LLM browser

description.p: Toledo1 is a revolutionary LLM browser that transforms how you interact with AI models and search the web.

Unlike traditional browsers, Toledo1 treats URLs as direct connections to LLM inference engines, creating a direct chat line to any LLM available on the public internet, private cloud, or local desktop.

ul.li: Client-Side Search: Powerful native desktop application that integrates seamlessly with your workflow. Search and process information directly from your PC.
No Subscriptions: Transparent pay-per-query pricing with enterprise-grade security. Only pay for what you use with our confidential API system.

AI Agent: Intelligent agentic search system with customizable LLM chains. Features API keyless configuration for presets using Toledo1 signon, enabling seamless model switching and automated reasoning workflows (in development).
Code Copilot: Our heavy-duty context management system supports never-ending large chat threads, making it ideal for edge function development in the cloud.
Web Search: Get live market data, weather information, and current events. Stay updated with accurate, real-time information.
History Management: Seamlessly transfer chat history between LLM systems while preserving context, including files and images.
Multi-Purpose Assistant: Customize Toledo1's behavior and expertise through flexible system settings for your specific needs.
File & Image Processing: Process multiple file formats including text, PDF, and images. Extract and analyze information from your documents to include images in PDFs.
Dynamic UI: Add or delete context continuously to include uploaded files or images
Think Mode: Chat with reasoning models across providers using presets on the same chat thread with think mode to solve your hardest problems
Share Chats: Import and export your chat's context with other Toledo1 users
Local Inference with Ollama: Maintain complete privacy with on-device processing when needed.

description.p: Toledo1 represents a paradigm shift in web search, functioning as a manual compound AI system - a truth machine that chains multiple models on context using customizable presets.
